description: This is a test script for the LiteLLMOpenAI model within the agno project, testing various functionalities such as basic response, streaming, async operations, memory, response modeling, and history management.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model used for structured response testing, representing a movie script with title, genre, and plot.

methods.name: _assert_metrics
methods.description: Helper function to verify that the RunResponse object contains valid metrics data.
